TopicTitle: Is there any mod will allow me to create extra runways around Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I am looking for a mod or something that will allow me to create extra runways across Kerbin with same attributes to the main runway at the KSC...

I hope something like this is available in a way that will not affect the game stability or performance...

Also, if not, anyway I can do that by editing the sfs file? I really get frustrated on how my sfs file is large so I did not look in it yet...

Appreciate your input

Saleh

there some more or less similars concepts yup:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library)
[Kerbin Side](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82785) adds some, not sure how easy it is to add your own.

Kerbin Side is good, but quite large. I personally use [KSC Switcher](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117893-) along with a config that I made to put KSC in the correct place, remove some wonky sites (as the default config has Earth sites in it), and add a few more Kerbin-specific sites.

The 2 nice things about KSC Switcher over Kerbin Side is that you just get the space centers, and they all look exactly like KSC (excpet they may be rotated)
